author: clement
msg: Modify temporary the manipulator pom file to support java 5 (annotation tests)
Add the constructor injection support in the InstanceManager. This is still in progress (no handler are supporting this injection yet, and a lot of test must be done).

author: fdmanana
msg: This version fixes a blocking issue (which rarely happens) when using the same connection
(with ot without pipelining) for multiple requests using the option {stream_to, {pid(), once}}.
